name: Saint Marciana
summary: Marciana of Toledo, also known as Marciana of Mauretania and Marciana of Caesarea, is venerated as a martyr and saint.
biography: Marciana of Toledo, also known as Marciana of Mauretania and Marciana of Caesarea, is venerated as a martyr and saint.
